setting.label: Bleed Setpoint
setting.description: Conductivity/ppm TDS Setpoint

setting.label: Conductivity Units
setting.description: Display the Conductivity as ppm TDS or uS/cm

setting.label: Hysteresis
setting.description: Set Bleed Hysteresis / Deadband as % of  Setpoint

setting.label: Bleed Cycle On Time
setting.description: On portion of Bleed Cycle

setting.label: Bleed Cycle Pause Time
setting.description: Off portion of Bleed Cycle

setting.label: pH Setpoint
setting.description: pH Setpoint

setting.label: Proportional Band
setting.description: Percentage away from Setpoint that Proportional control starts operating

setting.label: pH Control
setting.description: Select to Enable pH Control.

setting.label: Control Cycle Time
setting.description: pH Control Cycle Time is the Cycle Period used during Proportional Control

setting.label: Dose Cycle Pause Time
setting.description: OFF Period of pH Dose Cycle

setting.label: ORP Setpoint
setting.description: ORP Setpoint in millivolts(mV)

setting.label: ORP Operation (Dosing)
setting.description: Set to Oxidant if dosing Oxidising agent such as Chlorine or Bromine.  Set to Oxidant if dosing Reducing agent

setting.label: Proportional Band
setting.description: Percentage away from Setpoint that Proportional control starts operating

setting.label: ORP Control
setting.description: Select to Enable ORP Control.  If disabled, ORP output becomes a Timed Biocide B output

setting.label: Control Cycle Time
setting.description: ORP Control Cycle Time is the Cycle Period used during Proportional Control.

setting.label: Dose Cycle Pause Time
setting.description: OFF Period of ORP Dose Cycle

child.description: Setup all the timers for Biocide Dosing

setting.description: Select Saturday for Timer Program 1 to Operate on Saturday

setting.label: Bleed Lockout Setpoint = Bleed Setpoint +
setting.description: Bleed Lockout Setpoint = Bleed Setpoint + (% of  Bleed Setpoint)

setting.label: Pre-Bleed Setpoint = Bleed Setpoint -
setting.description: Pre-Bleed Setpoint = Bleed Setpoint - (% of  Bleed Setpoint)

setting.label: Condenser Pump Timer = Biocide Dose Time +
setting.description: Set the time for which the Condenser pump should run after Biocide dosing pump stops dosing

setting.label: Start Time
setting.description: Disinfection Start time in HHMM

setting.label: Duration
setting.description: Disinfection duration in HHMM

setting.description: Disinfect during week 1

setting.description: Disinfect during week 2

setting.description: Disinfect during week 4

setting.label: Disinfection Program
setting.description: To enable or Disable Disinfection control Boolean 1 for enable 0 for disable

setting.label: Disinfection ORP Setpoint
setting.description: Temporary ORP Setpoint used during Disinfection Program

setting.label: Flow Switch (F/S) Logic
setting.description: Mode for Flow Switch

setting.label: F/S for Bleed
setting.description: Bleed  disabled on No Flow

setting.label: F/S for Bio A
setting.description: Biocide A disabled on No Flow

setting.label: F/S for ORP / Bio B
setting.description: ORP / Biocide B disabled on No Flow

setting.label: F/S for Inhibitor
setting.description: Inhibitor disabled on No Flow

setting.label: F/S for pH
setting.description: pH disabled on No Flow

setting.label: F/S for Dispersant
setting.description: Dispersant disabled on No Flow

setting.label: F/S for Aux
setting.description: Auxiliary  disabled on No Flow

setting.label: Startup Delay
setting.description: Once power up or when flow is resumed after a no-flow condition, then the Startup delay is started (if set to a non zero value).  During this delay the controller pauses all control activity. Programmed in seconds

setting.label: Data Log Interval
setting.description: Data logging interval set in minutes (5,10,15,30,60,120, or 240)

setting.label: Additional Inhibitor Dose Start Time
setting.description: Start Time HHMM

setting.label: Additional Inhibitor Dose Duration
setting.description: Additional Inhibitor Dose Time

setting.label: Water Meter Make-up Pulses / kL
setting.description: No of make-up pulses received per 1000 litres

setting.label: Water Meter Bleed Pulses / kL
setting.description: No of bleed pulses received per 1000 litres

setting.label: Approx Make-up ppm TDS
setting.description: Approximate Make-up Conductivity

setting.label: Interval between Successive Datalog uploads to server
setting.description: Time Interval between successive connections between the DP+ and Webserver

setting.description: Tank 1

setting.description: Tank 2

setting.label: High Alarm
setting.description: High Conductivity Alarm

setting.label: Low Alarm
setting.description: Low Conductivity Alarm

setting.label: High pH Alarm
setting.description: pH High  alarm value

setting.label: Low pH Alarm
setting.description: pH Low alarm value

setting.label: High ORP Alarm
setting.description: ORP high  alarm value

setting.label: Low ORP Alarm
setting.description: ORP Low alarm value

setting.label: No Flow Alarm
setting.description: Click to Enable

setting.label: Alarm Trip Delay Time
setting.description: Delay in seconds before an alarm is reported

setting.label: Delay for Comms Lost
setting.description: Delay before raising comms lost alarm

setting.label: Max Bleed Time
setting.description: Maximum time in minutes for continuous bleed before output turned off and alarm is reported

setting.label: Timer Alarm Hysteresis
setting.description: Percentage away from Setpoint that Timer Alarm will cancel if this value reached before Dose Timer Alarm timer times out

setting.label: ORP Dose Timer Alarm
setting.description: Time within which mV should easily reach ORP Setpoint once dosing commences (i.e. ORP Setpoint less Timer Alarm Hysteresis)

setting.label: pH Dose Timer Alarm
setting.description: Time within which pH should easily reach pH Setpoint once dosing commences (i.e. pH Setpoint less Timer Alarm Hysteresis)

child.description: Setup what alarm messages are sent and to whom

description: Ad hoc actions, like Manual Dosing

setting.description: Once-off Dose Duration in minutes
